level.heading: HEALTH CARE AND LIFE INSURANCE PLANS (§ 14-7131)

level.text: Benefits are available to all full-time employees, other than contract employees, as outlined in health and insurance plans, which may be obtained in the Office of Human Resource Management. Employees who are terminated may elect to continue health coverage at their own expense under the Authority’s group plan as specified in the plan.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 42 DCR 6914, 6930 (December 8, 1995).
